name: a blockchain is a blockchain is blockchain
description: Decentralized blockchain humming along, so people are increasingly thinking about how they might use it to transform other parts of the supply chain or other parts of life in general. One industry that's traditionally followed the floodgates-of-opportunity-as-rains approach to even seeing possible uses for emerging tech is the ad industry. It's a metaphor for a big time industry stuck in the idea of next. We may be on the precipice of another level of advancement in digital advertising—creating experiences that are simply better than anything currently available to consumers.
